sentences.en: I did have rather spindly legs.
sentences.cn: 我的腿以前细长而纤弱。

sentences.en: At least the clothing covered his spindly body for now.
sentences.cn: 至少现在衣服盖住了他单薄细长的身体。

sentences.en: It was spindly looking with a tall skinny stalk and only one head on it.
sentences.cn: 它有着细长的外形，高而瘦削的茎梗，之上只有一个头。
